verses.verse: Of the children of <S%H1121>Ammon.<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> Has <S%H3478>Israel<s%> no <S%H1121>sons?<s%> has he no <S%H3423>heir?<s%> why then does <S%H4428>Malcam<s%> <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in its <S%H5892>cities?<s%>

<S%H3117>Therefore,<s%> behold, the days <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that I will cause an <S%H8643>alarm<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> to be <S%H8085>heard<s%> against <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%> of the children of <S%H1121>Ammon;<s%> and it shall become a <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H8510>heap,<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall be <S%H3341>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire:<s%> then shall <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3423>possess<s%> those who <S%H3423>possessed<s%> <S%H5002>him,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H3213>Wail,<s%> <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> for <S%H5857>Ai<s%> is laid <S%H7703>waste;<s%> <S%H6817>cry,<s%> you <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H7237>Rabbah,<s%> <S%H2296>clothe<s%> yourself in <S%H8242>sackcloth:<s%> <S%H5594>lament,<s%> and run back and <S%H7751>forth<s%> among the <S%H4428>fences;<s%> for Malcam shall <S%H3212>go<s%> into <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> his <S%H3548>priests<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

Why do you <S%H1984>glory<s%> in the <S%H6010>valleys,<s%> your <S%H2100>flowing<s%> <S%H6010>valley,<s%> <S%H7728>backsliding<s%> <S%H1323>daughter?<s%> who <S%H982>trusted<s%> in her <S%H214>treasures,<s%> <S%H935>saying,<s%> Who shall come to me?

<S%H935>Behold,<s%> I will bring a <S%H6343>fear<s%> on <S%H5002>you,<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> from all who are <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H5080>you;<s%> and you shall be driven out every <S%H376>man<s%> right <S%H6440>forth,<s%> and there shall be none to gather <S%H6908>together<s%> the <S%H5074>fugitives.<s%>
But <S%H310>afterward<s%> I will bring <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Of <S%H123>Edom.<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> Is <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> no more in <S%H8487>Teman?<s%> is <S%H6098>counsel<s%> <S%H6>perished<s%> from the <S%H995>prudent?<s%> is their <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H5628>vanished?<s%>

<S%H5127>Flee,<s%> turn <S%H6437>back,<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H6009>depths,<s%> <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1719>Dedan;<s%> for I will <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H343>calamity<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> on <S%H6256>him,<s%> the time that I shall visit <S%H6485>him.<s%>

If grape <S%H1219>gatherers<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7604>you,<s%> would they not leave some gleaning <S%H5955>grapes?<s%> if <S%H1590>thieves<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> <S%H7843>wouldn't<s%> they destroy until they had <S%H1767>enough?<s%>

But I have made <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H2834>bare,<s%> I have <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his secret <S%H4565>places,<s%> and he shall not be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H2247>hide<s%> <S%H2233>himself:<s%> his seed is <S%H7703>destroyed,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and his <S%H7934>neighbors;<s%> and he is no more.
<S%H5800>Leave<s%> your fatherless <S%H3490>children,<s%> I will preserve them <S%H2421>alive;<s%> and let your <S%H490>widows<s%> trust in <S%H982>me.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H4941>Behold,<s%> they to whom it didn't pertain to <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H3563>cup<s%> shall <S%H8354>certainly<s%> <S%H8354>drink;<s%> and are you he who shall <S%H5352>altogether<s%> go <S%H5352>unpunished?<s%> You shall not go <S%H5352>unpunished,<s%> but you shall <S%H8354>surely<s%> <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

For I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by <S%H5002>myself,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that <S%H1224>Bozrah<s%> shall become an <S%H8047>astonishment,<s%> a <S%H2781>reproach,<s%> a <S%H2721>waste,<s%> and a <S%H7045>curse;<s%> and all its <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall be <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2723>wastes.<s%>

I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H8052>news<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and an <S%H6735>ambassador<s%> is <S%H7971>sent<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H6908>saying,<s%> Gather yourselves together, and <S%H935>come<s%> against <S%H6965>her,<s%> and rise up to the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>
<S%H5414>For,<s%> behold, I have made you <S%H6996>small<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H959>despised<s%> among <S%H120>men.<s%>

As for your <S%H8606>terror,<s%> the <S%H2087>pride<s%> of your <S%H3820>heart<s%> has <S%H5377>deceived<s%> <S%H7931>you,<s%> O you who dwell in the <S%H2288>clefts<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock,<s%> who <S%H8610>hold<s%> the <S%H4791>height<s%> of the <S%H1389>hill:<s%> though you should make your <S%H7064>nest<s%> as <S%H1361>high<s%> as the <S%H5404>eagle,<s%> I will bring you <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H5002>there,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H123>Edom<s%> shall become an <S%H8047>astonishment:<s%> everyone who <S%H5674>passes<s%> by it shall be <S%H8074>astonished,<s%> and shall <S%H8319>hiss<s%> at all its <S%H4347>plagues.<s%>

As in the <S%H4114>overthrow<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%> and the <S%H7934>neighbor<s%> cities of <S%H559>it,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> no <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H1121>there,<s%> neither shall any son of <S%H120>man<s%> live <S%H1481>therein.<s%>

<S%H5927>Behold,<s%> he shall come up like a <S%H738>lion<s%> from the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> against the <S%H386>strong<s%> <S%H5116>habitation:<s%> for I will <S%H7280>suddenly<s%> make them run <S%H7323>away<s%> from <S%H977>it;<s%> and whoever is chosen, him will I <S%H6485>appoint<s%> over <S%H3259>it:<s%> for who is like me? and who will appoint me a time? and who is the <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> who will <S%H5975>stand<s%> before <S%H6440>me?<s%>

Therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that he has <S%H3289>taken<s%> against <S%H123>Edom;<s%> and his <S%H4284>purposes,<s%> that he has <S%H2803>purposed<s%> against the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H8487>Teman:<s%> Surely they shall drag them <S%H5498>away,<s%> the <S%H6810>little<s%> ones of the <S%H6629>flock;<s%> surely he shall make their <S%H5116>habitation<s%> desolate over <S%H8074>them.<s%>

The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7493>trembles<s%> at the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of their <S%H5307>fall;<s%> there is a <S%H6818>cry,<s%> the <S%H6963>noise<s%> which is <S%H8085>heard<s%> in the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea.<s%>

<S%H5927>Behold,<s%> he shall come up and <S%H1675>fly<s%> as the <S%H5404>eagle,<s%> and <S%H6566>spread<s%> out his <S%H3671>wings<s%> against <S%H1224>Bozrah:<s%> and the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> at that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be as the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%> in her <S%H6887>pangs.<s%>

Of <S%H1834>Damascus.<s%> <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> is <S%H954>confounded,<s%> and <S%H774>Arpad;<s%> for they have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8052>news,<s%> they are <S%H4127>melted<s%> <S%H1674>away:<s%> there is sorrow on the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> it <S%H3201>can't<s%> be <S%H8252>quiet.<s%>

<S%H1834>Damascus<s%> has grown <S%H7503>feeble,<s%> she <S%H6437>turns<s%> herself to <S%H5127>flee,<s%> and <S%H7374>trembling<s%> has <S%H2388>seized<s%> on <S%H6869>her:<s%> anguish and <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> have <S%H270>taken<s%> hold of <S%H3205>her,<s%> as of a woman in travail.
How is the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H8416>praise<s%> not <S%H5800>forsaken,<s%> the <S%H7151>city<s%> of my <S%H4885>joy?<s%>

Therefore her young <S%H970>men<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in her <S%H7339>streets,<s%> and all the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> shall be brought to <S%H1826>silence<s%> in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>
I will <S%H3341>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> of Ben <S%H1130>Hadad.<s%>

Of <S%H6938>Kedar,<s%> and of the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of <S%H2674>Hazor,<s%> which <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H5221>struck.<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H6938>Kedar,<s%> and <S%H7703>destroy<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6924>east.<s%>

Their <S%H168>tents<s%> and their <S%H6629>flocks<s%> shall they <S%H5375>take;<s%> they shall <S%H5375>carry<s%> away for themselves their <S%H3407>curtains,<s%> and all their <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and their <S%H1581>camels;<s%> and they shall <S%H7121>cry<s%> to <S%H4032>them,<s%> Terror on every <S%H5439>side!<s%>

<S%H5127>Flee,<s%> <S%H5110>wander<s%> far <S%H3966>off,<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H6009>depths,<s%> you <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H2674>Hazor,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> for <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> has taken <S%H6098>counsel<s%> against <S%H2803>you,<s%> and has conceived a purpose against <S%H4284>you.<s%>

<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%> to a <S%H1471>nation<s%> that is at <S%H7961>ease,<s%> that <S%H3427>dwells<s%> without <S%H983>care,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> that have neither <S%H1817>gates<s%> nor <S%H1280>bars,<s%> that <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H910>alone.<s%>

Their <S%H1581>camels<s%> shall be a <S%H957>booty,<s%> and the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of their <S%H4735>livestock<s%> a <S%H7998>spoil:<s%> and I will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> to all <S%H7307>winds<s%> those who have the <S%H6285>corners<s%> of their <S%H7112>beards<s%> cut <S%H935>off;<s%> and I will bring their <S%H343>calamity<s%> from every <S%H5676>side<s%> of <S%H5002>them,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H2674>Hazor<s%> shall be a <S%H4583>dwelling<s%> place of <S%H8577>jackals,<s%> a <S%H8077%H99999>desolation<s%> <S%H5769>forever:<s%> no <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H1121>there,<s%> neither shall any son of <S%H120>man<s%> live <S%H1481>therein.<s%>

The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> that came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> concerning <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> in the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> <S%H7665>Behold,<s%> I will break the <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> the <S%H7225>chief<s%> of their <S%H1369>might.<s%>

On <S%H5867>Elam<s%> will I <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>winds<s%> from the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7098>quarters<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> them toward all those <S%H7307>winds;<s%> and there shall be no <S%H1471>nation<s%> where the <S%H5080>outcasts<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam<s%> shall not <S%H935>come.<s%>

I will cause <S%H5867>Elam<s%> to be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>life;<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> on <S%H2740>them,<s%> even my fierce <S%H639>anger,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3615>them,<s%> until I have consumed them;
and I will <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H3678>throne<s%> in <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> and will <S%H6>destroy<s%> from there <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H8269>princes,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
But it shall happen in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that I will bring <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
